remarks: The predicate " ` F ` is a continuous function from topology ` J ` to topology ` K ` ."  Definition of continuous function in [Munkres] p. 102.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
statement:
iscn $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) -> ( F e. ( J Cn K ) <-> ( F : X --> Y /\ A. y e. K ( `' F " y ) e. J ) ) ) $.
$d F y $.
$d J y $.
$d K y $.
$d X y $.
$d Y y $.
